desc: A complete guide to the most powerful new features and changes of the new release of Lotus Notes/Domino. Administrators and developers working with any version of Lotus Notes/Domino, and needing the low-down on how to successfully make the most of the 7.0 upgrade. Another benefit is you can use this book to help you pass the 190-702 Update exam. This book covers the important exam topics.

details.authors: Tim Speed, Dick McCarrick, Barry Heinz, Tara Hall, Matthew Henry, Wendi Pohs

title: Upgrading to Lotus Notes and Domino 7: Upgrade your company to the latest version of Lotus Notes and Domino.
